title: Adopt New Interest Rate Model on Ethereum
body:
## Summary

With the new interest rate model on Binance Smart Chain, both supply and borrow APY are much higher after utilization rate hits 80%. It would be more stable and healthier for the protocol to target utilization rate at 80% steadily by adopting the same interest rate model on Ethereum.

**For**: to adopt new interest rate model on Ethereum
**Against**: No change required

## Specification

BSC interest rate model ([documentation](https://docs.cream.finance/lending/interest-rate-model))
![](https://i.imgur.com/5aoSePr.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/Fg4vOj7.png)

Current intereste rate model on Ethereum ([documentation](https://docs.cream.finance/lending/interest-rate-model))
![](https://i.imgur.com/IyOXwfj.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/EgaTtP5.png)
